version_description: We've made some layout and functional improvements.

As well as your favourite sports, now you can bet on categories like Entertainment and Politics. Have an idea for a bet that we don’t have yet? Let us know and we’ll make it happen for you with our brand new Name-A-Bet category.
You can now build your multis faster. After adding the first item to the Bet Slip, all other Fixed Odds bets will go straight to the Bet Slip.
We've made improvements to the layout and navigation.
You can now start earning Reward Points for each and every bet you place. Once you have enough points, trade them for Bonus Bets.
You can now log into your account with a PIN or Face/Touch ID.
You can now place bets while an event is live with 'In Play' betting.
We've made some layout and functional improvements.
We've made a number of design updates and improved the overall look and feel.
We've made some layout and functional improvements.

NEW EXTENDED RACING FORM – All your Racing form in one place; previews and tips, speedmaps via Racenet.com.au
iOS 13 compatibility
We've made some layout and functional improvements.

Huge Performance Improvements
Enhanced Racing Home Page
Brand New Betslip
Brand New Quick Bet Modal
Same Game Multi
Quick Multi Builder
Price updates in Betslip and Quick Bet
Pending Bets in Betslip popout
Cash out From Betslip
Redesigned Account Drawer with Booster Counter
Menu Redesign
Tab Bar Redesign
UI Improvements across the entire app

Further improvements to UI and performance from 2.5.1:

Huge Performance Improvements
Enhanced Racing Home Page
Brand New Betslip
Brand New Quick Bet Modal
Same Game Multi
Quick Multi Builder
Price updates in Betslip and Quick Bet
Pending Bets in Betslip popout
Cash out From Betslip
Redesigned Account Drawer
Menu Redesign
Tab Bar Redesign
UI Improvements across the entire app
Minor UX and Performance Improvements
Further improvements to Performance and UX
Further improvements to Performance and UX

Performance Improvements
Improved handling of network connectivity errors in bet placement

Added filters for improved searching on sport and competition pages
New Help Centre to you to search and browse for PointsBet help articles
Improvements to Credit/Debit verification process to provide better instruction
Improvements to Activity Statements
General Performance enhancements

• You can now filter by sport and competition so you can find the market you want even quicker!

• Need to top up before getting your bet on? You can use your saved credit card to deposit directly from the betslip so you don't miss the jump!

• Find your resulted bets faster! Your recent settled bets will now appear in the ‘My Bets' tab so you can see all your recent activity without searching through menus.

• Multiple improvements under the hood to make the app even faster.

• You can now filter by sport and competition so you can find the market you want even quicker!

• Need to top up before getting your bet on? You can use your saved credit card to deposit directly from the betslip so you don't miss the jump!

• Find your resulted bets faster! Your recent settled bets will now appear in the ‘My Bets' tab so you can see all your recent activity without searching through menus.

• Multiple improvements under the hood to make the app even faster

• Get In faster – improved registration and login
• New multi features – enhancements to same game multi and our quick multi builder
• Same game multi for Big Bash League
• Improved handling of pending bets for racing exotics
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements

• Racing exotic pending and settled bets now show leg details
• Link to events from pending and settled bets in My Bets
• Improvements to login via biometrics
• SGM improvements
• Improvements to bonus bet handling

And a range of performance and user experience improvements!

* Multiple Performance Improvements
* User Experience Improvements
* Improved Customer Contact
